title: Cold climate gardening (to extend the growing season)

tasks.task: Building a glass house for frost protection and extending growing season
subtasks: Ordering glass panels from a local supplier
Securing wood from a friend's mill
Protecting citrus plants (blood oranges, Meyer lemons, etc.)
Stretching goat skin over parts of the structure (for ventilation or shelter)
Growing various crops including chilis, Capsicons, and Tamarillos within the greenhouse
Stowing nursery plants (e.g., knocked by frost) in the glass house
Adapting to cold climate gardening techniques
